    public class MysqlBookDaoImpl
extends MysqlAbstractDao
implements BookDao

        public int count​(java.sql.Connection connection,
                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> parameters)
          throws DbException,
                 BadRequestException
        MySQL specific realization of BookDao.count(Connection, Map) method.
        Specified by:
        count in interface BookDao
        Parameters:
        connection - instance of Connection to reach the database.
        parameters - parameters of where clause.
        Returns:
        number of rows in the table books with where clause specified by the filter given in parameters.
        Throws:
        DbException - is thrown if data cannot be retrieved.
        BadRequestException - is thrown if some of parameters are invalid.

                            java.lang.String query,
                            Book book)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        A utility method that depending on query inserts or updates data from an instance of Book to the table book_descriptions.

        connection - an instance of Connection to reach the database.
        query - MySQL insert or update query for the table book_descriptions.
        book - an instance of Book to get data from.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - is thrown if SQLException is thrown while processing the query.

        A utility method that depending on parameters sets where clause for MySQL select query.
        Parameters:
        parameters - an instance of Map representing filter parameters.
        Returns:
